name: New Combat Cookies Match3
description:
New Combat Cookies Match3 is a FREE game which uses for children, for girls and for everyone as a whole. Do not hesitate, download, establish, play and enjoy this free match 3 games now
The best classic match 3 candy puzzle game. On a sweet day, you want to create many delicious treats so let's go to candy world, you will get sweet candies, tasty cookie and colorful jelly everywhere.
New Combat Cookies Match3
Fantastic candy wonderland
Over 500 well-designed FREE levels are waiting for your challenge
Colorful and vivid candy graphics
Lollipop: Sweet lollipop help you to smash the any candy you want to crush
Scrumptious, delicious, and gummy candy bomb
Stunning music and sound effects
